html: As we prepare for @POTUS' State of the Union speech tomorrow, we will be sharing some fun facts -- #SOTU Trivia: In 1913, Woodrow Wilson re-established the practice of delivering the address in person. Prior to that, the address was often written and sent to Congress.
text:
As we prepare for @POTUS' State of the Union speech tomorrow, we will be sharing some fun facts --

#SOTU Trivia: In 1913, Woodrow Wilson re-established the practice of delivering the address in person. Prior to that, the address was often written and sent to Congress.

html: Since coming to Congress, I have worked to reverse the coarsening of our public discourse and to restore the public's trust in our institutions and our nation's leaders. Since coming to Congress, I have worked to reverse the coarsening of our public discourse and to restore the public's trust in our institutions and our nation's leaders.
